name: Annual Maintenance Contract (AMC)
shortDesc: Comprehensive annual maintenance contract ensuring optimal elevator performance year-round
overview: Our Annual Maintenance Contract (AMC) is a comprehensive service plan designed to keep your elevators running smoothly 365 days a year. name: Corrective Maintenance Contract (CMC)
shortDesc: Flexible corrective maintenance contract for repair and emergency services
overview: Our Corrective Maintenance Contract (CMC) provides rapid-response repair services when your elevator needs urgent attention. Unlike preventive contracts, CMC focuses on fixing problems as they occur with guaranteed response times of under 2 hours. Our expert technicians are available 24/7 to diagnose issues, perform repairs, and get your elevator back in service quickly. CMC is ideal for buildings that prefer pay-as-you-go maintenance with the security of priority response and competitive repair rates.
